title: Headways summaries are your shortcut to personal growth
description: Personal growth made easy with Headway Premium — unlimited lifetime access to quick, personalized lessons for $59.99.
text: TL;DR: Transform your spare moments into growth with Headway Premium for just $59.99 (reg. $299) — a lifetime of bite-sized learning.Do you find yourself scrolling endlessly through social media, only to be annoyed at yourself for wasting your time on nonsense? The Headway Premium app was created to turn spare moments into opportunities for growth.For just $59.99 (reg. $299), this lifetime subscription (pay just once) gives you the tools you need to master your personal and professional goals — all in bite-sized, 15-minute summaries.The new year is the perfect time to make positive changes, and Headway makes it pretty easy. Forget spending hours poring over endless resources. Headway curates concise insights from acclaimed nonfiction bestsellers and tailors them to your specific goals. Whether you want to boost your career, improve your health, or build better habits, this app puts actionable tips at your fingertips.While Headway is all about giving you the salient points from some of the world's top minds, it also allows for some fun. With gamified features, you’ll track your progress, earn achievements, and feel motivated as you grow. You'll also get offline access to professionally narrated summaries, so you can learn anywhere. That means you can listen to these summaries while commuting, exercising, or cleaning the house.This is a one-time purchase for lifetime access, meaning no subscriptions, no recurring fees — just unlimited learning for less than one dinner out. With over 1,500 summaries and 30 to 50 new ones added monthly, you’ll always have fresh, relevant content to explore.This limited-time offer is available to new users only. If you’ve been considering Headway, now is the time to go for it.Crush your self-growth goal forever with a lifetime of Headway Premium for just $59.99 (reg. $299). html:
TL;DR: Transform your spare moments into growth with Headway Premium for just $59.99 (reg. $299) — a lifetime of bite-sized learning.

Do you find yourself scrolling endlessly through social media, only to be annoyed at yourself for wasting your time on nonsense? The Headway Premium app was created to turn spare moments into opportunities for growth.

For just $59.99 (reg. $299), this lifetime subscription (pay just once) gives you the tools you need to master your personal and professional goals — all in bite-sized, 15-minute summaries.

The new year is the perfect time to make positive changes, and Headway makes it pretty easy. Forget spending hours poring over endless resources. Headway curates concise insights from acclaimed nonfiction bestsellers and tailors them to your specific goals. Whether you want to boost your career, improve your health, or build better habits, this app puts actionable tips at your fingertips.

While Headway is all about giving you the salient points from some of the world's top minds, it also allows for some fun. With gamified features, you’ll track your progress, earn achievements, and feel motivated as you grow.

You'll also get offline access to professionally narrated summaries, so you can learn anywhere. That means you can listen to these summaries while commuting, exercising, or cleaning the house.

This is a one-time purchase for lifetime access, meaning no subscriptions, no recurring fees — just unlimited learning for less than one dinner out. With over 1,500 summaries and 30 to 50 new ones added monthly, you’ll always have fresh, relevant content to explore.

This limited-time offer is available to new users only. If you’ve been considering Headway, now is the time to go for it.

Crush your self-growth goal forever with a lifetime of Headway Premium for just $59.99 (reg. $299).
